name: Moisturizing Volume Spray for Fine and Thinning Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Spray
about: What it is:A heat-activated volumizing spray that visibly strengthens and plumps strands for long-lasting fullness and weightless body..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Long-lasting weightless volume from root to tip: No stickiness, no drying, no mattifying.Highlighted Ingredients:- Rice Amino Acids and Wheat Starch: Gives hair fullness and volume..Ingredient Callouts:It comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This heat-activated volume spray is the secret to soft, weightless volume. It lifts at the root and plumps strands using rice amino acids for fullness, onion juice for strength, and apple extract for hydration. This fast-acting volume spray is suitable for all hair types for a bigger, fuller mane..Fragrance Description:This volume spray has a majestically warm spice blend of Indian saffron and nutmeg paired with midnight rose damascena and Indian jasmine sambac, with a touch of incense for an unexpected richness...Clinical Results:Based on an independent consumer-perception study of 34 female participants ages 25-65 with fine to medium hair:
ingredients: -Rice Amino Acids and Wheat Starch: Give hair fullness and volume..-Onion Extract: Visibly strengthens hair, prevents hair thinning, and supports denser hair growth..-Apple Extract: High in vitamin C for extra moisture...Water (Aqua), Propanediol Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Tocopherol, Bacopa Monnieri Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Allium Cepa (Onion) Bulb Extract, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Wheat Amino Acids, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearamidoethyldiethonium Succinoyl Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polyquaternium-4, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Salicylate (EU Frag Allergen), Limonene (EU Frag Allergen), Hydroxycitronellal (EU Frag Allergen), Citronellol (EU Frag Allergen)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz generously on clean, towel-dried hair all over, focusing on the roots..-Blow-dry to heat activate..-For more volume and fullness, direct hair away from the head or use a round brush to lift roots while blow-drying..-Style as usual for a soft, voluminous mane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable and Mane don't get the credit it deserves. Their products are so inexpensive compared to rival products that make the same claim, and they actually WORK! First of all, that amazing smell that everyone is talking about is oud. I'm a sucker for oud and can smell it from a mile away. Why they don't mention it in the ingredients is beyond me. It says fragrance but doesn't mention that it's an all natural fragrance. They'd probably sell a lot more if they listed it. Also, the product says heat activated, but I never apply ANY product before drying my hair for fear of damage. I apply this product to 80% air dried hair and then just let it do it's thing and my hair feels and smells so luxurious. keep in mind that a few spritz goes a long way. once completely dried, I  have so much volume at the scalp without it feeling heavy or like residue. This product brought my natural waves to life, moisturized my scalp, and I didn't have to add anything else for frizz control. Perfect balance for the most natural wash and go.

reviews.review_title: This product slays for fine hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Fable and Mane Volume Moisturizing is my new favorite hair product. My hair is very fine and texturized. It takes a lot of product to create volume that holds my style without weighing it down. Finding something that works consistently is difficult. However, this spray is a game changer. I sprayed a small amount on my towel dried hair at the roots then l used a round brush with my blow dryer. The volume was incredible without my hair feeling sticky or stiff. It held my style for hours and the scent was delicious. The ingredients are natural and thoughtful for those of us who are more conscious about what we use on our bodies and hair. Try this if your hair is thin or fine. You'll love it as much as I do!

reviews.review_title: My honest review for medium, frizzy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane's Moisturizing Volume Spray promises soft, weightless volume, heat protection, and frizz control. It uses onion and apple extracts for plumping and hydration, targeting fine to medium hair. I have medium, wavy hair with a tendency to frizz, especially around the ends.  I usually struggle to find volume products that don't weigh my waves down or make them look stringy. I used the Moisturizing Volume Spray on several occasions, following the instructions to apply it to damp hair before styling. While it did add some root volume, my hair looked messy and uncontrolled. It looked very puffy after I blow-dried my hair, but less puffy when I straightened it, though!  I loved the scent, it's a little strong so if you're sensitive to scents you might not like it. And the heat protection that it provides was definitely a plus!   While the root lift was good, the frizz factor and messy texture were dealbreakers for me. It might be a good option for someone with fine, straight hair who prioritizes volume over frizz control, but for my wavy, frizz-prone locks, it wasn't the perfect match.  Additional notes: I couldn't include better images of my hair after use as I wasn't satisfied with the results. It's important to remember that haircare is highly personal, and what works for one person might not work for another. I recommend trying small samples or travel-sized products before committing to a full-size bottle. I hope this honest review helps you decide if the Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray is right for your hair!

reviews.review_text: I've been using the Moisturizing Volume Spray by Fable & Mane for a while now, and it's become an absolute game-changer for my hair routine. My hair tends to fall flat due to excess oil buildup, especially since I don't wash it every day. This spray has been a lifesaver in keeping my hair feeling fresh and clean between washes.  What I love most about this spray is its dual-action formula. Not only does it effectively absorb excess oil, but it also provides a boost of moisture, leaving my hair feeling incredibly soft and nourished. The added volume it gives is just the cherry on top!  I've tried numerous products in the past, but none have quite matched up to the results I've achieved with Fable & Mane's Moisturizing Volume Spray. If you're looking for a solution to limp, oily hair, I highly recommend giving this spray a try. It's become an essential part of my haircare routine, and I can't imagine going without it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane's Moisturizing Volume Spray is a true gem in the world of hair care. From the moment I spritz it onto my locks, I can feel its hydrating and volumizing effects working wonders. The lightweight formula doesn't weigh my hair down, yet it adds noticeable volume and bounce, giving my hair that coveted fullness without any stiffness or residue. What truly sets this volume spray apart is its unique blend of ingredients, including sacred ingredients from India like Ashwagandha and Tiger Grass, renowned for their nourishing and strengthening properties. Not only does it provide volume, but it also works to improve the overall health and resilience of my hair. I also appreciate that Fable & Mane is committed to sustainability, using eco-friendly packaging and cruelty-free practices. Knowing that I'm supporting a brand that cares about both my hair and the planet adds an extra layer of satisfaction.If you're looking for a volume spray that delivers on its promises while also nourishing your hair from within, look no further than Fable & Mane's Moisturizing Volume Spray. It's a game-changer for achieving effortlessly voluminous and healthy-looking locks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: How do I even begin to describe how much I. LOVE. THIS. SPRAY? Goodness gracious. First of all the smell is absolutely flipping amazing. It smells so good. I know. You looked at the label and saw onions.  DO NOT FEAR that it might smell like onions. It doesn't. It smells like heaven (which I assume does not smell like onions--I don't know yet). Second of all--the VOLUME IS REAL. I have long-ish hair, about 3-4 below my shoulders with very low elevation layering. I have no layers shorter than my shoulders and my bangs are past my chin. I also have baby fine, very dry 3A curly hair that is pretty dense.  My biggest struggle with it, indeed, is volume. The curls don't like the weight of the length so they can stretch to become 2C if I don't encourage them to stay 3A. This spray is the encouragement I've been looking for to whip my long hair into voluminous shape. IT IS INCREDIBLE. I was very doubtful at first but after the third try I was convinced I will never want to be without it. If you have hair my length or shorter and you are looking for help with volume I'm telling you this is the spray for you. Plus you will smell incredible!

reviews.review_text: This spray has an oily, serum-y feeling in the hand, but seems to quickly absorb into the hair. They get weighed down easily by many products, especially by many products that are geared towards curly hair. I have to balance between using products that keep my hair from being frizzy but that don’t weigh my hair down. This seemed to have a nice balance of that. I think this product would be best for wavy or curly types that need a light product with little hold. I don’t think this will have enough hold for very curly hair or straight hair. Also, the fragrance in this is quite strong, so no need to wear a perfume if you are wearing this! The scent lasts at least a day for me. reviews.review_text: I love this Fable and Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray. I mainly love that it doesn't leave my hair dry and crusty. It also smells amazing and lifts my hair up! I would highly recommend It you have pretty flat hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the sample of Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray. It’s a heat-activated volumizing spray product that instantly strengthens and plumps strands for long-lasting fullness and weightless body. It lifts at the root and plumps strands using rice amino acids for fullness, onion juice for strength and apple extract for hydration. This instant-volume spray is suitable for all hair types for a bigger, fuller mane. It has a high in vitamin C for extra moisture. It has a majestically warm spice blend of Indian saffron and nutmeg paired with midnight rose damascena and Indian jasmine sambac, with a touch of incense for an unexpected richness. I usually spritz generously on clean, towel-dried hair all over, focusing on the roots than blow-dry to heat-activate for more volume and fullness, direct hair away from the head or use a round brush to lift roots while  blow-drying. Style as usual for a soft, voluminous mane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has an amazing scent! I used it all over my hair right out of the shower, before drying it, and it gives my hair body. I like that it has natural ingredients such as apple and onion. I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first read the scents I was a little concerned about how the product would smell but you don’t notice the onion at all. I definitely noticed more volume in my hair after using this product and was impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, this volumizing hairspray smell so amazing. Next thing, this really gives the volume for my fine hair while keeping it moisturized and shiny. Also I love that the ingredients are so natural. Higly recommend if you looking for a natural volumizing and moisturizing hair spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m dealing with a lot of breakage and I don’t even have enough hair in the back to blowout. Then this bottle arrived right before I got my hair cut, so at least you can see the results. Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray gave my fine hair lift and movement. I built more volume on the sides and front than in the back, because I lost the most hair on the back of my crown. I was concerned that the effective ingredients were onion and apple, but the fragrance covered the onion well. The woody unisex scent actually made this a pleasant experience. I sprayed the roots before blow drying each section with a hot air brush. This spray gave my hair volume without stiffness or stickiness. It’s supposed to moisturize your hair, but I still had to use a scalp oil after my hair was dry. Yes, I recommend F&M Moisturizing Volume Spray to anyone with delicate, fine or medium hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I believe that I have used fable and mane hair products before and I really really liked them! I have dyed, wavy hair so I am hopeful that this product really gives my hair some more volume! I am excited to try!

It also made my hair a little less frizzy and added some shine to it, which I really like. It’s not sticky at all either and makes your hair feel soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at how much this did for my hair. I’m in my early 40s and have fine, thinning hair. This was easy to apply and I really liked how the bottle sprayed. It was a nice light even mist. I honestly may have gone overboard but you would never had known because it didn’t weigh my hair down at all. It has a nice natural scent that isn’t strong at all but still smells fresh and clean. I take showers at night and I don’t usually blow dry my hair so I’m not the biggest fan of having to use heat to set the product (as the directions state). Saying that, I was surprised at how fast my hair dried and how much volume it gave my hair. My hair even felt a bit thicker. It made my hair look beautiful and voluminous as if I had a professional blow out. My hair still looked great the next morning. I was worried that the apple and onion might affect my color but if anything, my color looked more vibrant. I am loving this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After covid and a surgery, my long hair started to fall out and became fine and thin. I've always been on the lookout for products that can provide both volume and hydration without weighing my hair down. My search led me to try the Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in more ways than one. First and foremost, the formulation of this spray is truly impressive. Enriched with a blend of rice amino acids, wheat starch, onion extract, and apple extract, it not only adds instant volume to my hair but also strengthens and nourishes it from root to tip. What sets this volume spray apart from others on the market is its heat-activated formula. By simply blow-drying my hair after application, I can instantly activate the volumizing properties of the spray, resulting in long-lasting fullness that lasts throughout the day.  But perhaps the most delightful aspect of this volume spray is its enchanting scent. The majestic blend of Indian saffron, nutmeg, midnight rose damascena, Indian jasmine sambac, and a hint of incense creates an indulgent olfactory experience that lingers throughout the day, leaving my hair smelling absolutely divine.

reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Sprayis a true game-changer when it comes to hair care products. I recently had the opportunity to try it out, and I can confidently say that it has transformed my hair routine. What sets the Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray apart from other volumizing products is its unique formula. It is infused with nourishing ingredients like ashwagandha, rice protein, and aloe vera, which work together to provide hydration, volume, and protection to the hair. This combination of ingredients not only adds volume to my hair but also leaves it feeling incredibly soft and smooth. I was pleasantly surprised by how lightweight this spray is. It doesn't weigh down my hair or make it feel sticky or greasy, which is a common issue with other volumizing products. Instead, it adds a natural lift and bounce to my hair, making it look fuller and more voluminous. One of the standout features of the Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray is its incredible scent. It has a beautiful, exotic fragrance that lingers in the hair throughout the day, leaving a pleasant and refreshing aroma. I also appreciate that this product is free from harmful ingredients such as sulfates, parabens, and phthalates. It is cruelty-free and suitable for all hair types, including color-treated hair. Overall, I highly recommend the Fable & Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray. It not only adds volume and body to the hair but also provides nourishment and hydration. With its luxurious packaging, delightful scent, and high-quality formula, it is a must-have for anyone looking to achieve voluminous and healthy-looking hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing Volume Spray for Fine and Thinning Hair by Fable and Mane is must to have! First it smells amazing and gives ALL THE VOLUME to your hair. Leaves hair softer, healthier, shinier! Easy to apply it’s spray bottles, very lightweight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I noticed when initially trying the moisturizing volume spray from Fable and Mane was the scent, it is luxurious and rich, similar to a high end perfume. My hair is thick and wavy/curly and on the dryer side but falls flat a day or two after styling. This kept my hair voluminous without weighing it down. It’s perfect for diffusing or using an air wrap curler since it provides heat protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just had the opportunity to try the Fable and Mane Moisturizing Volume Spray and I am very impressed with the results. This product is a lightweight mist that adds volume, shine, AND hydration to my hair without weighing it down or making it greasy. It has a lovely scent of coconut water, cardamom, and papaya, which makes me feel like I’m in a tropical paradise. I love how this product is vegan, cruelty-free, and ethically sourced, as well as being inspired by ancient Indian beauty rituals. I use this spray on damp or dry hair, depending on how much volume I want. I spray it evenly from roots to ends and then comb through or scrunch with my fingers. It gives my hair a noticeable boost of body, as well as a smooth and glossy finish. My hair feels soft, healthy, and manageable, and I get compliments on how it looks and smells. It is definitely one of my favorite hair care products and I will be repurchasing it when I run out.

reviews.review_title: Smells amazing and doesn’t weigh down my thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this whenever I’m styling my hair and don’t want any heavy product. It’s ultra moisturizing so it keeps my hair soft and touchable all day while giving my a nice boost of volume! The smell is really nice it’s super fruity as well.
